author: defidevin
content: Is ETH already using a POS consensus framework?

author: defidevin
content: I know it's migrating tot his but im curious how far along the protocol is

author: pietjepuk
content:
See e.g. https://blog.ethereum.org/2021/08/25/finalized-no-28/ (posts in that series), https://hackmd.io/@benjaminion/eth2_news , or activities over on the github repo https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs

If you want to get started with staking (with 32 ETH, or 32 GoETH on the testnets), feel free to join the ethstaker discord server ( discord.io/ethstaker )
